title: How it works
subtitle: A simple, clear process with no hassle. The website is usually completed within one to two weeks, depending on the content provided and the responsiveness of our exchanges.

step1.title: Discussion & scope
step1.text: We discuss your business, your goals, your pages, and the overall direction of the website.

step2.title: Structure & mockup
step2.text: I prepare the website structure and a mockup. Once validated, a 30% deposit is required to start the project.

step3.title: Content delivery
step3.text: Once the mockup is approved, you send me your texts and photos (I can guide you if needed).

step4.title: Development & launch
step4.text: I develop the website, then assist you with purchasing a domain name in your name (annual cost) and deploy the site on Vercel, under your account (free hosting).

step5.title: Handover & follow-up
step5.text: Once the website is completed and the balance paid, I provide you with the full source code and all access credentials. You fully own your website, while I remain available if needed.
